channel.title: America's African heritage
channel.description:
This series explores Africa's influence on twentieth-century life in America through the travels of host Skip Westphal.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: #25: From Lagos to Cape Town and #26: Conserving Wildlife in Africa
item.description: Episode 25 discusses Westphal's travel experiences that did not appear in other episodes, including his impressions of Lagos, Nigeria, and other brief segments about musical instruments, diamond minds, and the role of African frogs in medical science. Episode 26 focuses on a plane trip to observe wildlife in Southern Rhodesia.
item.dc:creator: Cleary, Norman
item.dc:subject: Travel & Leisure

item.title: #7: The Singing Boatmen of Accra and #8: We Talk with a Friend of George Washington Carver
item.description: Episode 7 focuses on the workers who move cargo from ships to the shore near Accra, Ghana. Episode 8 focuses on Westphal's conversation with theologian Harry V. Richardson, who was also traveling to observe African cultures.
item.dc:creator: Cleary, Norman
item.dc:subject: Work songs

item.title: #4: Monrovia, Liberia
item.description: This episode discusses the ship's arrival in Monrovia, Liberia, and Westphal's initial impressions of the port.
item.dc:creator: Cleary, Norman
item.dc:subject: Wages

item.title: #9: 1 Doctor for 30,000 People and #10: Medicine from the Root of a Tree
item.description: Episode 9 discusses the experiences of patients and healthcare workers at the Evangelical Medical Instute of Kimpese in the Congo. Episode 10 focuses on a recording from a Chicago pharmaceutical plant about medicines containing products from Africa.
item.dc:creator: Cleary, Norman
item.dc:subject: Travel & Leisure

item.title: #18: Digging for Diamonds in Bakwanga
item.description: This episode focuses on the Bakwanga industrial diamond mines in the Congo.
item.dc:creator: Cleary, Norman
item.dc:subject: Travel & Leisure

item.title: #13: Landing at Brabanta and #14: The Brabanta Oil Palm Plantations
item.description: Episode 13 features an interview with a passenger from Westphal's boat trip on the Congo River and the boat's arrival at an oil palm plantation in Brabanta. Episode 14 focuses on the workers at an oil palm plantation in Brabanta.
item.dc:creator: Cleary, Norman
item.dc:subject: Travel & Leisure

item.title: #2: What We Can Learn from the People of Africa
item.description: This episode focuses on an interview with a Salvation Army captain and their ideas about what Americans can learn from Africa.
item.dc:creator: Cleary, Norman
item.dc:subject: Travel & Leisure

item.title: #21: The Fabuous Goldmines at Johannesburg Part 1
item.description: This episode focuses on Westphal's experience observing the goldmines of Johannesburg, South Africa (part 1 of 2).
item.dc:creator: Cleary, Norman
item.dc:subject: Travel & Leisure

item.title: #5: A Liberian Rubber Plantation and #6: Slave Dungeons at Elmina Castle
item.description: Episode 5 focuses on a rubber plantation near Monrovia, Liberia. Episode 6 discusses Elmina Castle, a fortress in Ghana that was used to imprison enslaved people during the translantic slave trade.
item.dc:creator: Cleary, Norman
item.dc:subject: Travel & Leisure

item.title: #9: 1 Doctor for 30,000 People
item.description: This episode discusses the experiences of patients and healthcare workers at the Evangelical Medical Instute of Kimpese in the Congo.
item.dc:creator: Cleary, Norman
item.dc:subject: Travel & Leisure

item.title: #8: We Talk with a Friend of George Washington Carver
item.description: This episode focuses on Westphal's conversation with theologian Harry V. Richardson, who was also traveling to observe African cultures.
item.dc:creator: Cleary, Norman
item.dc:subject: Travel & Leisure

item.title: #20: The Kolwezi Cobalt Mines
item.description: This episode discusses the copper and cobalt mines at Kolwezi in the Congo.
item.dc:creator: Cleary, Norman
item.dc:subject: Travel & Leisure

item.title: #10: Medicine from the Root of a Tree
item.description: This episode focuses on a recording from a Chicago pharmaceutical plant about medicines containing products from Africa.
item.dc:creator: Cleary, Norman
item.dc:subject: Travel & Leisure

item.title: #5: A Liberian Rubber Plantation
item.description: This episode focuses on a rubber plantation near Monrovia, Liberia.
item.dc:creator: Cleary, Norman
item.dc:subject: Travel & Leisure

item.title: #11: The Medicine Gardens of Kisantu
item.description: This episode discusses medical uses of the rauvolfia root.
item.dc:creator: Cleary, Norman
item.dc:subject: Travel & Leisure

item.title: #26: Conserving Wildlife in Africa
item.description: This episode focuses on a plane trip to observe wildlife in Southern Rhodesia.
item.dc:creator: Cleary, Norman
item.dc:subject: Travel & Leisure

item.title: #17: Okotombulu and His Adventure with the Elephant and #18: Digging for Diamonds in Bakwanga
item.description: Episode 17 discusses Westphal's experience staying in village in the Congo with members of a Methodist mission and the story of an African man's encounter with an elephant. Episode 18 focuses on the Bakwanga industrial diamond mines in the Congo.
item.dc:creator: Cleary, Norman
item.dc:subject: Travel & Leisure

item.title: #19: Cobalt and the Treatment of Cancer and #20: The Kolwezi Cobalt Mines
item.description: Episode 19 focuses on a recording from an Iowa cancer clinic about cobalt's use in cancer treatments. Episode 20 discusses the copper and cobalt mines at Kolwezi in the Congo.
item.dc:creator: Cleary, Norman
item.dc:subject: Travel & Leisure

item.title: #7: The Singing Boatmen of Accra
item.description: This episode focuses on the workers who move cargo from ships to the shore near Accra, Ghana.
item.dc:creator: Cleary, Norman
item.dc:subject: Work songs

item.title: #23: Smelting Gold and Cutting Diamonds and #24: Snakes and Perfume
item.description: Episode 23 discusses the processes of gold refinement and diamond mining and cutting. Episode 24 focuses on interviews with American soap and perfume manufacturers about ingredients from African countries.
item.dc:creator: Cleary, Norman
item.dc:subject: Travel & Leisure

item.title: #11: The Medicine Gardens of Kisantu and #12: By Riverboat Up the Congo
item.description: Episode 11 discusses medical uses of the rauvolfia root. Episode 12 focuses on Westphal's boat trip on the Congo River and his interviews with other passengers.
item.dc:creator: Cleary, Norman
item.dc:subject: Travel & Leisure

item.title: #6: Slave Dungeons at Elmina Castle
item.description: This episode discusses Elmina Castle, a fortress in Ghana that was used to imprison enslaved people during the translantic slave trade.
item.dc:creator: Cleary, Norman
item.dc:subject: Travel & Leisure

item.title: #1: Loading Cargo for Africa and #2: What We Can Learn from the People of Africa
item.description: Episode 1 discusses preparing the ship for departure and Westphal's plans for the series. Episode 2 focuses on an interview with a Salvation Army captain and their ideas about what Americans can learn from Africa.
item.dc:creator: Cleary, Norman
item.dc:subject: Travel & Leisure

item.title: #12: By Riverboat Up the Congo
item.description: This episode focuses on Westphal's boat trip on the Congo River.
item.dc:creator: Cleary, Norman
item.dc:subject: Travel & Leisure

item.title: #19: Cobalt and the Treatment of Cancer
item.description: This episode focuses on a recording from an Iowa cancer clinic about cobalt's use in cancer treatments.
item.dc:creator: Cleary, Norman
item.dc:subject: Travel & Leisure

item.title: #22: The Fabuous Goldmines at Johannesburg Part 2
item.description: This episode focuses on Westphal's experience observing the goldmines of Johannesburg, South Africa (part 2 of 2).
item.dc:creator: Cleary, Norman
item.dc:subject: Travel & Leisure

item.title: #21: The Fabuous Goldmines at Johannesburg Part 1 and #22: The Fabuous Goldmines at Johannesburg Part 2
item.description: Episodes 21 and 22 focus on Westphal's experience observing the goldmines of Johannesburg, South Africa.
item.dc:creator: Cleary, Norman
item.dc:subject: Travel & Leisure

item.title: #3: Glimpses into the Life of a Seaman and #4: Monrovia, Liberia
item.description: Episode 3 focuses on interviews with sailors on the ship traveling across the Atlantic. Episode 4 discusses the ship's arrival in Monrovia, Liberia, and Westphal's initial impressions of the port.
item.dc:creator: Cleary, Norman
item.dc:subject: Wages

item.title: #15: A Visit with the King of the Bakubas and #16: Attending School in Wild Animal Country
item.description: Episode 15 focuses on the Bakuba kingdom and Westphal's experience meeting the king. Episode 16 discusses a Methodist mission school in the Congo.
item.dc:creator: Cleary, Norman
item.dc:subject: Travel & Leisure
